title: An Act providing for a town administrator in the town of Hopedale

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Murray of Milford, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4784) of Brian W. Murray (by vote of the town) relative to the town administrator in the town of Hopedale.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 12/11/2025 from 03:00 PM-04:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
